name: Boots of Striding
description: During your movement, add +2 Move to the movement.

notes.title: FAQ
notes.note: Boots of Striding only add to the numerical value of an existing single movement ability. They do not give you a free movement action.

name: Winged Shoes
description: During your movement, add Jump to the movement.

notes.title: FAQ
notes.note: Winged Shoes may be used for only a single movement ability, not for multiple movement abilities of an action (ex: Action with Move, Attack, Move).

name: Hide Armor
description: On the next two sources of damage to you from attacks, gain Shield 1.

notes.title: FAQ
notes.note: Hide Armor only grants the shield for the attack, not until the end of the round.

name: Leather Armor
description: When attacked, the attacker gains Disadvantage on the attack.

notes.title: FAQ
notes.note: The Leather Armor must be used before the enemy draws an attack modifier card.

name: Cloak of Invisibility
description: During your turn, gain INVISIBLE.

name: Eagle-Eye Goggles
description: During your attack, gain Advantage on the entire Attack action.

name: Iron Helmet
description: When attacked, consider any 2x attack modifier card the enemy draws to be a +0 instead.

name: Heater Shield
description: When damaged by an attack, gain Shield 1 for the attack.

name: Piercing Bow
description: During your ranged attack, ignore all Shield values for the entire Attack action.

name: War Hammer
description: During your melee attack, add STUN to the entire Attack action.

name: Poison Dagger
description: During your melee attack, add POISON to a single attack.

name: Minor Healing Potion
description: During your turn, perform a "Heal 3, self" action.

name: Minor Stamina Potion
description: During your turn, Recover up to two of your discarded cards.

notes.title: Errata
notes.note: The item should allow you to recover only one discarded card. This is change in an upcoming expansion but may be used for the base game.

name: Minor Power Potion
description: During your attack, add +1 Attack to your entire Attack action.

name: Boots of Speed
description: At the beginning of a round, after all ability cards have been revealed, increase or decrease your leading initiative value by 10.

name: Cloak of Pockets
description: You can carry two additional small items.

name: Empowering Talisman
description: During your turn, Refresh one of your consumed small items.

name: Battle-Axe
description: During your single-target melee attack action, turn the attack into the following: {multi_attack.cone_0_1}

name: Weighted Net
description: During your ranged attack, add IMMOBILIZE to a single attack.

name: Minor Mana Potion
description: During your turn, create any element. {any}

name: Stun Powder
description: During your attack, add STUN to a single attack.

name: Heavy Greaves
description: You are immune to all forced movement caused by enemies or scenario effects.

name: Chainmail
description: On the next three sources of damage to you from attacks, gain Shield 1.

notes.title: FAQ
notes.note: Chainmail only grants the shield for the attack, not until the end of the round.

name: Amulet of Life
description: During your turn, Heal 1 damage.

name: Jagged Sword
description: During your melee attack, add WOUND to a single attack.

name: Long Spear
description: Turn a single-target melee attack into the following: {multi_attack.line_0_1_1}

name: Major Healing Potion
description: During your turn, perform a "Heal 5, self" action.

name: Moon Earring
description: During your turn, Refresh all of your spent items.

name: Comfortable Shoes
description: Whenever you use the default bottom of an ability card, perform a Move 3 action instead of a Move 2 action.

name: Studded Leather
description: When attacked, the attacker gains Disadvantage on the attack and you gain Shield 1 for the attack.

name: Hawk Helm
description: During your ranged attack, add +1 Range to your entire Attack action.

name: Tower Shield
description: When damaged by an attack, gain Shield 2 for the attack.

name: Volatile Bomb
description: During your single-target ranged attack action, turn the attack into the following: {multi_attack.cone_1_1}

name: Major Stamina Potion
description: During your turn, Recover up to three of your discarded cards.

notes.title: Errata
notes.note: The item should allow you to recover only two discarded cards. This is change in an upcoming expansion but may be used in the base game.

name: Falcon Figurine
description: Summon Jade Falcon (Flying)

notes.title: FAQ
notes.note: The card is treated like a persistent bonus, going in the active area until the summon is killed or the card is removed (removing the summon and consuming the item). If the card is refreshed and there is an active summon from the card, the active summon disappears.

name: Boots of Dashing
description: During your movement, add +3 Move to the movement.

name: Robes of Evocation
description: During your attack, {anyX} to add +1 Attack to the entire Attack action.

name: Heavy Basinet
description: You are immune to STUN and MUDDLE.

name: Hooked Chain
description: During your ranged attack, add PULL 2 to the entire Attack action.

name: Versatile Dagger
description: Whenever you use the default top of an ability card, perform an Attack 3 action instead of an Attack 2 action.

name: Major Power Potion
description: During your attack, add +2 Attack to your entire Attack action.

name: Ring of Haste
description: At the end of your turn, play one card from your hand and immediately perform the bottom action of the card.

name: Boots of Quickness
description: At the beginning of a round, after all ability cards have been revealed, increase or decrease your leading initiative value by 20.

name: Splintmail
description: On the next four sources of damage to you from attacks, gain Shield 1.

name: Pendant of Dark Pacts
description: During your turn, Refresh two of your consumed small items. Gain CURSE.

notes.title: FAQ
notes.note: The perk that ignores item effects does not prevent you from being cursed.

name: Spiked Shield
description: When damaged by an attack, gain Shield 1 and Retaliate 2 for the attack.

name: Reaping Scythe
description: During your single-target melee attack action, turn the attack into the following:  {multi_attack.cleave_0_1}

name: Major Mana Potion
description: During your turn, create any two elements. {any} {any}

name: Sun Earring
description: During your turn, Refresh all of your spent items and Heal 3 damage.

name: Steel Sabatons
description: If you move 1 or fewer hexes on your turn, gain Shield 1 for the round.

name: Shadow Armor
description: When you are damaged by an attack, suffer no damage instead.

name: Protective Charm
description: You are immune to POISON and WOUND.

name: Black Knife
description: During your melee attack, add CURSE to a single attack.

name: Staff of Eminence
description: During your ranged attack, {anyX} to add +1 Attack to the entire Attack action.

name: Super Healing Potion
description: During your turn, perform a "Heal 7, self" action.

name: Ring of Brutality
description: At the end of your turn, play one card from your hand and immediately perform the top action of the card.

name: Serene Sandals
description: Whenever you use the default bottom of an ability card perform a Move 4 action instead of a Move 2 action.

name: Cloak of Phasing
description: Gain Flying. While occupying an obstacle hex, you are considered Invisible and cannot attack

name: Telescopic Lens
description: During your ranged attack, add +2 Range to your entire Attack action

name: Unstable Explosives
description: Turn a single target ranged attack into the following: {multi_attack.cube_2_2}. All allies in the attack area suffer 3 damage.

name: Wall Shield
description: When damaged by an attack, gain Shield 4 for the attack.

name: Doom Powder
description: During your attack, add STUN, POISON, and CURSE to a single attack.

name: Lucky Eye
description: During your turn, STRENGTHEN yourself and all adjacent allies.

name: Boots of Sprinting
description: During your movement, add +4 Move to the movement.

name: Platemail
description: On the next five sources of damage to you from attacks, gain Shield 1.

name: Mask of Terror
description: During your melee attack, add PUSH 1.

name: Balanced Blade
description: Whenever you use the default top of an ability card, perform an Attack 4 instead of an Attack 2 action.

name: Halberd
description: During your single target melee attack, you can attack and single enemy within 2 hexes.

name: Star Earring
description: During your turn, Refresh all of your spent items, Heal 3 damage, and Recover up to two of your discarded cards.

name: Second Chance Ring
description: At the end of your turn, play two cards from your hand and perform an additional turn this round based on your new leading initiative (which must be later than your previous initiative).

name: Boots of Levitation
description: Gain Flying

name: Shoes of Happiness
description: If you move 6 or more hexes on your turn, gain {exp1}.

name: Blinking Cape
description: During your turn, perform a "Move 4, Jump" action

name: Swordedge Armor
description: On the next three sources of damage from attacks targeting you, gain Shield 1, Retaliate 1

name: Circlet of Elements
description: During your turn, {anyX} to create any element. {any}

name: Chain Hood
description: While you are adjacent to three or more monsters, gain Shield 1

name: Frigid Blade
description: During your melee attack, {iceX} to add +2 Attack to a single attack.

name: Storm Blade
description: During your melee attack, {windX} to add +2 Attack to a single attack.

name: Inferno Blade
description: During your melee attack, {fireX} to add +2 Attack to a single attack.

name: Tremor Blade
description: During your melee attack, {earthX} to add +2 Attack to a single attack.

name: Brilliant Blade
description: During your melee attack, {lightX} to add +2 Attack to a single attack.

name: Night Blade
description: During your melee attack, {darkX} to add +2 Attack to a single attack.

name: Wand of Frost
description: During your turn, create Ice. {ice}

name: Wand of Storms
description: During your turn, create Wind. {wind}

name: Wand of Infernos
description: During your turn, create Fire. {fire}

name: Wand of Tremors
description: During your turn, create Earth. {earth}

name: Wand of Brilliance
description: During your turn, create Light. {light}

name: Wand of Darkness
description: During your turn, create Dark. {dark}

name: Minor Cure Potion
description: During your turn, remove one negative condition on yourself. This can be used while you have STUN.

name: Major Cure Potion
description: During your turn, remove all negative conditions on yourself. This can be used while you have STUN.

name: Steel Ring
description: When damaged by an attack targeting you, gain Shield 4 for the attack.

name: Dampening Ring
description: Before an enemy would consume an element, consume that element instead for no effect

name: Scroll of Power
description: During an ally's attack, add +1 Attack to their entire attack action

name: Scroll of Healing
description: During your turn, perform a "Heal 3, Range 5" action

name: Scroll of Stamina
description: During your turn, an ally within Range 5 may Recover up to two of their discarded cards

name: Rocket Boots
description: During your movement, add +3 Move and Jump to a single movement

name: Endurance Footwraps
description: If you move 4 or more hexes on your turn, perform a ""Heal 1, Self"" action.

name: Drakescale Boots
description: You are unaffected by difficult and hazardous terrain.

name: Magma Waders
description: Ignore the damaging effects of hazardous terrain and perform a ""Heal 2, Self"" action on any turn in which you have entered a hazardous terrain hex.

name: Robes of Summoning
description: During your turn, perform a "Heal 2, target any summoned ally" action.

name: Second Skin
description: Remove two {modifier_minus_one} from your attack modifier deck.

name: Sacrificial Robes
description: During your ranged attack, suffer 3 damage to add +1 Attack to the entire Attack action.

name: Drakescale Armor
description: You are immune to POISON and WOUND.

name: Steam Armor
description: On the next five sources of damage from attacks targeting you, gain Shield 1.

name: Flea-Bitten Shawl
description: You are considered to have an initiative of 99 for the purpose of enemy focusing.

notes.title: FAQ
notes.note: The item does not actually change a character's initiative so it doesn't affect their summons' initiative. It only changes how monster's treat the character during focus evaluation.

name: Necklace of Teeth
description: Any time you kill an enemy during your turn, perform a "Heal 1, Self" action.

name: Horned Helm
description: After moving 4 or more hexes on your turn, add +1 Attack to your next melee attack this turn.

notes.title: FAQ
notes.note: This bonus must be used on the turn it is gained. It cannot be saved. If you perform multiple move abilities, you may use the item as long as you have moved a total of at least 4 hexes. The item can only be used once during your turn even if you move 4 hexes multiple times during your turn.

name: Drakescale Helm
description: Whenever you gain MUDDLE, gain STRENGTHEN instead.

name: Thief's Hood
description: During your "Loot 1" ability, perform a "Loot 2" ability instead.

name: Helm of the Mountain
description: When attacked, if {earth} is Strong, Immobilize the attacker.

name: Wave Crest
description: When attacked, if {ice} is Strong, perform a "PUSH 2" action targeting the attacker.

name: Ancient Drill
description: During your melee attack, add +2 Attack and PIERCE 2 to the entire Attack action

name: Skullbane Axe
description: During your melee attack targeting a Living Corpse, Living Spirit, or Living Bones, add +5 Attack to a single attack.
source:
Reward From Scenario #11
Reward From Scenario #12

name: Staff of Xorn
description: During your ranged attack, add POISON and MUDDLE to the entire Attack action

name: Mountain Hammer
description: Summon Warrior Spirit

notes.title: FAQ
notes.note: The card is treated like a persistent bonus, going in the active area until the summon is killed or the card is removed (removing the summon and consuming the item). If the card is refreshed and there is an active summon from the card, the active summon disappears.

name: Fueled Falchion
description: During your single-target melee attack, the target and all enemies adjacent to the target suffer 1 damage

name: Bloody Axe
description: During your melee attack, suffer 2 damage to add +1 Attack to the entire Attack action.

name: Staff of Elements
description: During your turn, create any element. {any}

name: Skull of Hatred
description: During your turn, CURSE all adjacent enemies.

name: Staff of Summoning
description: During your turn, a summoned ally within Range 3 performs a "Move 3" action with you controlling the action.

name: Orb of Dawn
description: During your turn, {darkX} to create Light. {light}

name: Orb of Twilight
description: During your turn, {lightX} to create Dark. {dark}

name: Ring of Skulls
description: Summon Skeleton

notes.title: FAQ
notes.note: The card is treated like a persistent bonus, going in the active area until the summon is killed or the card is removed (removing the summon and consuming the item). If the card is refreshed and there is an active summon from the card, the active summon disappears.

name: Doomed Compass
description: During your turn, force an enemy within Range 5 to perform a "Move 2" action with you controlling the action.

name: Curious Gear
description: During your turn, disarm all traps within Range 2.

name: Remote Spider
description: During your turn, POISON all adjacent enemies.

name: Giant Remote Spider
description: During your turn, perform a "Loot 1" action.

name: Black Censer
description: During your turn, Muddle all enemies with Range 2.

name: Black Card
description: During your turn, place a character token on an adjacent normal or elite enemy. You add +1 Attack to all your attacks targeting this enemy.

name: Helix Ring
description: During your turn, {lightX} {darkX} to perform a "Heal 25, Self" action

name: Heart of the Betrayer
description: When attacked by an adjacent normal enemy, force the enemy to attack one of its allies within its range instead.

notes.title: FAQ
notes.note: This item cannot be used if there is no other enemy in range to be attacked.

name: Power Core
description: Summon Steel Construct.

notes.title: FAQ
notes.note: The card is treated like a persistent bonus, going in the active area until the summon is killed or the card is removed (removing the summon and consuming the item). If the card is refreshed and there is an active summon from the card, the active summon disappears.

name: Resonant Crystal
description: During your turn, destroy an adjacent obstacle.

name: Imposing Blade
description: Any time you kill an enemy during your turn, gain Shield 1 for the rest of the round.

name: Focusing Ray
description: During your Heal action, double the value of the Heal.

name: Volatile Elixir
description: During your ranged attack, add +2 Attack and gain Advantage on the entire Attack action, but suffer 2 damage for each attack made.

name: Silent Stiletto
description: Any time you perform a melee attack, add PIERCE 1 to the Attack.

name: Stone Charm
description: During your action where an obstacle is created, create one additional obstacle and apply all effects of the action to it.

name: Psychic Knife
description: Any time you perform an Augment action, add +1 Attack to the entire action.

name: Sun Shield
description: When damaged by an attack, you may {lightX} to gain Shield 3 for the attack.

name: Utility Belt
description: During your turn, you or any one ally may Refresh one of your spent or consumed items.

name: Phasing Idol
description: When a summon you own is damaged by an attack, it suffers no damage instead.

name: Smoke Elixir
description: During your turn, gain INVISIBLE and create dark. {dark}

name: Pendant of the Plague
description: During your turn, POISON and CURSE one enemy within Range 3.

name: Mask of Death
description: Any time you perform a melee attack and you have exactly 1 hit point, add +2 Attack to the Attack.

name: Master's Lute
description: After performing any song action, immediately perform an Attack 2 or Move 2 action.

name: Cloak of the Hunter
description: Any time you perform a {Doom} action, MUDDLE the target of the {Doom}.

name: Doctor's Coat
description: Any time an ally performs a Medical Pack or Large Medical Pack action, they add +1 Heal to their Heal.

name: Elemental Boots
description: If you move 5 or more hexes on your turn, create any element. {any}

name: Staff of Command
description: After performing a Command action, play one card from your hand and immediately perform the same side of the card (top or bottom) as the Command action.
